name: I Flew in Business Class... on a CRJ?
description:
The CRJ-900 is a regional airliner that seats around 76 people, and Jazz Aviation operates 35 of these on behalf of Air Canada Express. What’s kind of noteworthy though is that they actually offer a proper domestic Business Class on these planes, with 12 seats in the first four rows.

So, I fell victim to a compelling check-in upgrade price once again, and flew in Business Class on a CRJ!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: Air Canada Express (Jazz) (JZA/QK)
Aircraft: Bombardier CRJ-900 (CRJ9)
Flight Number: AC8391
Seat: 4A (Business Class)
Livery: New (2017)
Engines: 2x GE CF34-8C5
Registration: C-GJZV
Route: Calgary (YYC) - Kelowna (YLW)
Callsign: JAZZ 391
Runway used: 35L (YYC) - 16 (YLW)
Date filmed: May 2022

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Outro song - "Take Flight" by Nyhtian: https://youtu.be/bCTTwQ_269c
